data.eml:eml: Iranian terrestrial isopods of the family Cylisticidae Verhoeff, 1949 with a description of a new species (Isopoda, Oniscidea)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kashani, Ghasem M. (2016): Iranian terrestrial isopods of the family Cylisticidae Verhoeff, 1949 with a description of a new species (Isopoda, Oniscidea). ZooKeys 582: 157-165, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.582.7199, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.582.7199
